ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: Application schema, Statistical Units
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines requirements associated with the application schema.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance Class 'Application Schema, Statistical Units'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'GML application schemas, Statistical Units'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: specific requirements
TestCase.description: Verify that the following specic requirements are meet

TestAssertion.label: su-as.a.1: geometry of statistical units
TestAssertion.description:
At least the geometry of statistical units, for which statistical data are made available under INSPIRE, shall be made available as well. This requirement applies to INSPIRE themes that refer to statistical units.

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Annex IV, Section 1.5: At least the geometry of statistical units, for which statistical data are made available under INSPIRE, shall be made available as well. This requirement applies to INSPIRE themes that refer to statistical units.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'specific requirements', INSPIRE Data Specification on Statistical Units, A.1.6

TestAssertion.label: su-as.a.2: pan-European usage
TestAssertion.description:
For pan-European usage, the Equal Area Grid defined in Section 2.2.1 of Annex II (IR-ISDSS) shall be used.

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Annex IV, Section 1.5: For pan-European usage, the Equal Area Grid defined in Section 2.2.1 of Annex II (IR-ISDSS) shall be used.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'specific requirements', INSPIRE Data Specification on Statistical Units, A.1.6

TestAssertion.label: su-as.a.3: Statistical data unit
TestAssertion.description:
Statistical data shall refer to their statistical unit through the unit’s external object identifier (inspireId) or thematic identifier (for vector units) or the unit’s code (for grid cells).

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Annex IV, Section 1.5: Statistical data shall refer to their statistical unit through the unit’s external object identifier (inspireId) or thematic identifier (for vector units) or the unit’s code (for grid cells).
Source: Abstract Test Case 'specific requirements', INSPIRE Data Specification on Statistical Units, A.1.6

TestAssertion.label: su-as.a.4: Statistical data version
TestAssertion.description:
Statistical data shall refer to a specific version of a statistical unit.

Relevant requirements:
  • IR Requirement Annex IV, Section 1.5: Statistical data shall refer to a specific version of a statistical unit.
Source: Abstract Test Case 'specific requirements', INSPIRE Data Specification on Statistical Units, A.1.6
